item.title: Le DailyCorner Cafe
item.description: Fruit, veg, bread, pastries. and cakes available to collect. Delivering fruit and veg for self-isolated people. Check their instagram daily for a morning video of what they have that day. How to order: Email ledailycorner@outlook.com Open 9am - 3pm (Tues - Sun) for takeaway and delivery within 1/2 mile Website: @le_dailycorner on instagram Address: 21 Upper Tulse Hill
